name: Pervasive Client Driver
body:
# Pervasive Client Driver for Fluent NHibernate

## Requirements
1. Pervasive Client Driver library loaded (v10.0+)
2. Reference: Pervasive.Data.Common, Pervasive.Data.SqlClient
3. Enjoy Pervasive support in NHibernate!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
